eng: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your saintly spirit, my lord, the honored father, the archpriest, Pope Abba (...).
And our father the metropolitan, Abba (...).
And our father the bishop, Abba (...).
And our fathers the metropolitans who are with us.
And our fathers the bishops who are with us.
May the clergy and all the people be safe in the Lord. Amen. So be it.
cop: Pi`hmot gar `mPen[oic Iycouc Pi`,rictoc@ ef`eswpi nem pek`agion `pneuma@ pa[oic `niwt ettaiyout `nar,i`ereuc papa abba (nim)
Mare pi`klyroc nem pilaoc tyrf@ oujai qen P[oic@ je `amyn ec`esopi.
